scripts.clean: npx rimraf node_modules/ output/ ios/capacitor-cordova-ios-plugins/ ios/DerivedData/ android/.gradle/ android/.idea/ android/capacitor-cordova-android-plugins/ android/local.properties android/app/build/
scripts.reset: npm run clean && npm ci && npx cap sync
scripts.cert:create: mkdir -p output/cert && JAVA_HOME=$(/usr/libexec/java_home) mkcert -install && JAVA_HOME=$(/usr/libexec/java_home) mkcert -key-file output/cert/dev-key.pem -cert-file output/cert/dev.pem *.dev
scripts.start:www: npm run cert:create && npx serve --ssl-cert output/cert/dev.pem --ssl-key output/cert/dev-key.pem www
